TopicTitle: Greetings From: Over the Double Rainbow and somewhere quite high.

Articles.Content:
(Cont. From Subject): As in the Stratosphere.

So I'm the not-so-amazing Zyamos! I'm 'Censored' years old, and I was born in raised in 'Censored', 'Censored'. 

Why I'm here: To amass ridiculously large amounts of community created content! (And take over the Kearth.)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Skunky
